charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1101_0100_2:
Janine was intently watching people 
going to and fro in town.
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1101_0200_2:
She did not notice [Name:PlayerNickname ]
as [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] approached her.
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_0300_1:
Hmm, I see.
So that’s how you’re gonna fight, huh?
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_0401_0600_1: I was, uh... I was watching the townspeople.
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_0302_0700_1: Do you see someone you know?
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_1000_1:
I was watching the movements of all the
Trainers and Pokémon in town.
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_1100_1:
I was also watching the Pokémon battles that
were happening all over.
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_1200_1: This is a part of my training, too!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_1300_1: I’ve been out here since early this morning!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_0301_1400_1:
You really work hard on 
your studies, don’t you?
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_0302_1600_1: You’re just slacking off, aren’t you?!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_1800_1: I train every day with Ariados.
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_1900_1:
But what makes Pokémon battles deep is the fact
that they’re more than just tests of strength.
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_2000_1:
It’s suuuper important that you read what your
opponent is thinking and build your strategy
around that!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_2100_1:
I was watching all of these Trainers
and Pokémon...
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_2200_1:
so I can learn to read one—even two—steps
ahead in battle.
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_2700_1: With perfect strategy is how a ninja fights!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_2800_1:
My father has always told me that I must train
not only my body but my mind and spirit, too!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_2900_1:
But...no matter how perfect your strategy is,
it doesn’t count for anything unless you are
connected with your Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_3000_1:
I learned that the most important thing is
for the Trainer and the Pokémon to have
a trusting relationship.
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_0401_3200_1:
It’s not like Ariados and I need 
that kind of advice, though! 
We have each other’s back all the time!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_0302_3300_1: I can see that being really important.
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_0402_3400_1:
It’s not like Ariados and I need 
that kind of advice, though! 
We have each other’s back all the time!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_3500_1:
All the pain and sorrows that we went through...
We were able to overcome them together.
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_3700_1:
Considering what good partners we are, 
I know we won’t lose to anybody!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_0301_3800_1: We’ll give you a run for your money!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_0401_3900_1: Well then, I guess that makes us rivals!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_0402_4200_1: We could beat my father and his Crobat!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_4300_1:
With our sync strength, Ariados and I will only
get stronger!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_4400_1: Stronger than you...and stronger than Father!
